column4: hi, I shared my folder in the network, how it can be accesibble from the other comupters?
it's accessible through the network... places > network
it's also accessible through windows machines ;)
sorry, but there is only windows-network without my machine
can it be accessible trough ip adress?
I prefer hostname
whatever
//(host hame)/(share)
thx
no prob.
DBus error org.freedesktop.DBus.Error.InvalidArgs: Mountpoint Already registered
hmm, seems like you already mounted it
can you tell me how I can access the directory from windows?/
go to your /home/(your name)/.gvfs/ folder and see if it's there
yeah, map network drive...
no it is not there '(..)/.gvfs'
so, your .gvfs folder is empty?
but the folder has double arrows
.gvfs is empty
huh, I guess you didn't mount it...
should I?
hmm...
places > connect to server > (service type: windows share; server: (your server); share: (your share name)
I've already check that but with hostname this is not possible, with ip address I see also some error, but I can see the folders
